original_text: Do not be unequally yoked with unbelievers. For what partnership has righteousness with lawlessness? Or what fellowship has light with darkness?
korean_text: 너희는 믿지 않는 자와 멍에를 함께 메지 말라 의와 불법이 어찌 함께 하며 빛과 어둠이 어찌 사귀며

sentences.original_text: Do not be unequally yoked with unbelievers.
sentences.korean_translation: 믿지 않는 자와 멍에를 함께 메지 말라.

sentences.original_text: For what partnership has righteousness with lawlessness?
Or what fellowship has light with darkness?
